jsky.image.gui
Class ImageColorbar

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--javax.swing.JComponent
                    |
                    +--jsky.image.gui.ImageColorbar
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.io.Serializable
public class ImageColorbar
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener

This widget displays a color bar with the colors used in the image and allows you to manipulate the color lookup table by dragging the mouse over the bar (based on the JAITutor demo by Dennis Sigel).

See Also:
Serialized Form
